purpose.para: If MetaObject is an instantiation of meta_namespace, then reflects_namespace inherits from ::boost::true_type. Otherwise it inherits from ::boost::false_type.

description.para: This template can be used to distinguish whether the opaque MetaObject type reflects a namespace and thus is an instantiation of meta_namespace.
